description: This is an unusual method to download files. It starts a browser headless and downloads a file from a location. This can be used by threat actors to download files. Author: Sreeman, Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: File Download with Headless Browser
query: (process.executable:(*\\msedge.exe OR *\\chrome.exe) AND process.command_line:*\-\-headless* AND process.command_line:*dump\-dom* AND process.command_line:*http*)
